name: The Santa Cookie
description:
This game was made on a dare, and crafted with tons of love and stress.

The Santa Cookie is about a special cookie who hid 3 gifts away from you, the player, around the house! Do you have what it takes to get each one without becoming the cookie's cookie? This game was also made intentionally made to look grungy.

Tools:

Unity 2019

Blender 2.8

Paint.Net

My Mom

Playtesters:

Russell Vujs Jr.

Saghaley Lewis

Mike Morico Jr.

Nathaniel Darnell

This game was made by Joshimations, Crooked Beaker Games, and folk at Good Friend Studios.
